original_title: My Husband Brought Home His Mistress 5
overview: Wait till you see what hubby brought home.  So... your clueless, cheating husband finally brought his mistress home! At first you can't believe he's doing this... but after seeing how hot she is, and knowing how good your husband can fuck? You decide, "If you can't beat 'em, FUCK 'EM!" Your husband might be next to useless, but he just brought home the sexiest girl you've ever seen!
title: My Husband Brought Home His Mistress 5
